name: beginner half double crochet hat
sizes_available: baby, toddler, child, teen/small adult, large adult
notes:
practice those half double crochet stitches and make yourself a hat at the same time with this beginner half double crochet hat!

--------------------------
you will receive
--------------------------
1 pdf digital download file for beginner half double crochet hat crochet pattern
instant download as soon as payment clears ravelry's system

written in english and u.s. crochet terms


----------------
yarn used
----------------
worsted weight yarn (#4)


----------
sizes
----------
size (head circumference):
baby (14-16”) [36-40cm]
toddler (16-18”) [41-46cm]
child (18-20”) [46-51cm]
small adult (21-22”) [53-56cm]
large adult (23-24”) [58.5-61cm]


-----------------
skill level
----------------- 
beginner


----------
notes
----------
~gauge is included in this pattern
~this pattern has been checked for accuracy. although this has been tested, please note that small errors can still slip by. i am happy to assist if you need any help.
~this is a free pattern on my blog, but you can also purchase this listing for the ad-free downloadable pdf version.
